completeness.description: Assesses whether the multi-agent system fully completed the steps necessary to achieve the task.

accuracy.description: Evaluates the correctness of the answer provided by the multi-agent system.

efficiency.description: Measures how efficiently the multi-agent system used resources to achieve the task.

reasoning_traceability.description: Determines the ability to follow the reasoning process of the agents step by step.

adaptability.description: Assesses the system's ability to adapt to new or unexpected task challenges.

data_contamination.description: Assesses whether the solution generated is free from data contamination such as reliance on already available internet text answers.

robustness.description: Evaluates the multi-agent system's ability to handle diverse and complex steps without failure.

solution_relevance.description: Determines the relevance of the solution to the original question posed.
